amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to eliminate funding for Migration and Refugee Assistance.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Migration and Refugee Assistance by $2,548,250,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 311 (Roll no. 469).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 311 (Roll no. 469).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
